Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Vase
Description: Miniature tube-shaped vase with a flat circular bottom and small slightly flared and misshapen foot. The body is asymmetrical, bulging at the bottom and narrowing at the top. Forty-seven vessels of this type were found in the same foundation deposit.
